import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import Header from'./Header';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function PuzzleSelection(){const[puzzles,setPuzzles]=useState([]);const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{fetch('https://da6d-2601-1c2-4503-61b0-62-7a49-5af4-c336.ngrok-free.app/puzzles',{method:"get",headers:new Headers({"ngrok-skip-browser-warning":"69420"})}).then(async response=>{// Get the raw response text
